1.title: Mothership 1998
1.plot: The Mothership is a variety show that pulls together the personalities, topics and interests across Nerdist and Geek and Sundry into one glorious package! It's live, interactive and extra awesome because the community is a big part of the show!

2.title: Brad Rutter, HQ Trivia, and Gang Beasts

5.title: Fangirling Debate, Will Friedle, and the Ikea Challenge
5.plot: The Mothership is a variety show that pulls together the personalities, topics and interests across Nerdist and Geek and Sundry into one glorious package! It's live, interactive and extra awesome because the community is a big part of the show!

6.title: Dating Advice, Weave Society, and Winter Games Challenge
6.plot: Jessica Chobot and Hector Navarro take a hilarious spin around the internet, receive dating advice from Amy Vorpahl, get the inside info with Weave Society's Amy Dallen and Gina DeVivo, and try their hand at winter game poses in this week's Mothership Challenge.

7.title: Because Science's Kyle Hill, Critical Role, and Starwhal Challenge
7.plot: Jessica Chobot and Hector Navarro learn about fictional metals in the MCU with Kyle Hill, find out who's the best Starwhal player in this week's Mothership Challenge, and a Critical Role special guest stops by for an update.

8.title: Binging with Babish Pop Culture Drinks, Fast Food Burger Snack Chat, & More!
8.plot: Hosts Amy Vorpahl and Hector Navarro taste test to determine the best fast-casual burger in Snack Chat, create pop culture drinks with Binging with Babish, throw down in Indie City with Them's Fightin' Herds, and try not to scream in this week's blind box Mothership Challenge.

9.title: The FINAL Episode: The Best of, Mario Kart 64 Slurpee Challenge Rematch, & More!
9.plot: After 65 episodes, it's the Mothership finale. Your hosts Jessica Chobot and Hector Navarro look back at the most momentous Mothership moments, play VR Bar Fight, Nidhogg 2, and an epic Mothership Challenge rematch for the ages.

1.title: Mothership! Wonder Woman, Doctor Strange, and Dice to Meet You!
1.plot: Welcome to Mothership! Jessica Chobot and Hector Navarro talk the latest in superhero (and superheroine) movies, spooky RPGs, and more!

2.title: Blind Jenga, Rubiks cube solving, Spellcasting with Jay Funk
2.plot: Jessica Chobot, and Hector Navarro are joined by Erika Ishii and Jay Funk

3.title: The Special Fantastic Beasts Episode!
3.plot: Hector Navarro and Jessica Chobot host a special Fantastic Beasts episode of Mothership! Enjoy all of the fantastic beasts roaming around during the show as they talk Fantastic Beasts (of course), dinosaurs, Dobby, and more!

4.title: Tasting Japan, Westworld, and Talks Machina!
4.plot: Hector Navarro and Jessica Chobot chat Talks Machina, Westworld, and more with guests Trish Hershberger and Brian Wayne Foster!

1.title: Asking Alexa and Snacks with Sherwin
1.plot: Jessica Chobot and Hector Navarro play a guessing game with Amazon's Alexa, learn a workout with the host of Max Hit Points, eat some healthy snacks with Zach Sherwin, and more!

2.title: Special Friday The 13th Episode!
2.plot: Jessica Chobot and Hector Navarro bring us a special Friday the 13th episode of Mothership! In celebration, the two speak speak to a real fortune teller, talk Shadow Zone, and more!

3.title: Popcorn Day, VR Magic, and Hitting Faces
3.plot: It's National Popcorn Day! Jessica Chobot and Hector Navarro talk popcorn and participate in the Mothership Challenge, Becca Scott Kerns and Eric Campbell play make VR magic, and more!

5.title: Giant Pizza & Tarantula Races
5.plot: Hector Navarro and Jessica Chobot stuff their faces with chips and dip and choose their champion tarantula in the Tarantual Bowl. Meanwhile, the office attempts to devour an extremely large pizza.

6.title: Cheeto Searching, Random Roul-eddit, and One Hundred Grand
6.plot: Jessica Chobot and Hector Navarro teach us how to make a quick one hundred grand on eBay, search for a special Cheeto, play random roul-eddit, and compete in the Mothership challenge!

8.title: Cheeto Auction, Mines N Crafts, and Try Not To Laugh!
8.plot: Hector Navarro is joined by co-host Amy Vorpahl for this episode of Mothership! The two reveal the final price for the Cheeto auction, talk Mines N Crafts, and try not to laugh.

9.title: Weird Al Yankovic, and ROBOT ARMS!
9.plot: Hector Navarro and Amy Vorpahl sit down for a special interview with the man himself, "Weird Al" Yankovic! Then they preview Ju-on: The Curse, and sing!

12.title: Andromeda, Roundtable, and CelebriD&D
12.plot: Hey stranger. It's been a while. I've missed you. Hector Navarro and Jessica Chobot are here for Mothership! This episode, they talk about Roundtable, CelebriD&D with Joe Manganiello, Mass Effect: Andromeda, and more!

13.title: Puppy Race and Chicken Nuggets
13.plot: On this episode of Mothership, Jessica Chobot and Hector Navarro present Puppership! Also, they find out who has the best chicken nuggets.

14.title: Wheel of Wipes, Popcorn Ping Pong Plinko, and Women's Fake News!
14.plot: Jessica Chobot and Hector Navarro present Mothership! This week, they play the wheel of wipes, popcorn ping pong planko, and bring on the Women's Fake News cast for Public Access!

17.title: Drinking and Mario Kart with Silicon Valley's Amanda Crew
17.plot: Jessica Chobot and Hector Navarro present Mothership! On this episode, we see a knife-game robot, failed keg tapping, and the two are joined by Silicon Valley's Amanda Crew to partake in some custom drinks and play Mario Kart!

18.title: Star Wars Day, and Star Wars Challenges
18.plot: Jessica Chobot and Hector Navarro present Mothership! On this episode we watch Public Access, hear from the cast of GotG 2, and compete in a Star Wars Mothership challenge!

19.title: Snack Chat w/ Marisha Ray and Hobby Horse Racing!
19.plot: Jessica Chobot and a large baby (Hector Navarro) present Mothership! This week, they're learning how to spar, compete in a hobby horse race, and chat about snacks with Marisha Ray!

20.title: Lootcrate Sneak Peak, Improv Lessons, and Alien Shoes
20.plot: This week on Mothership, Jessica Chobot and Hector Navarro take a look at new Alien: Covenant shoes, and have an improv lesson with Ptolemy Slocum and Derek Miller with an upcoming Lootcrate as a prop!
